title: Preparing for Helicopter Rescue from Water
brief: Steps to safely prepare for helicopter rescue pickup from a life raft or water.
steps: Step 1: Secure all loose equipment in raft, accessory bag, or pockets.
Step 2: Deploy sea anchor, stability bags, and accessory bag.
Step 3: Partially deflate the raft and fill it with water.
Step 4: Unsnap survival kit container from parachute harness.
Step 5: Grasp raft handhold and roll out of the raft into water.
Step 6: Allow recovery device or cable to ground out on water surface first.
Step 7: Maintain handhold on raft until recovery device is in your other hand.
Step 8: Mount recovery device while avoiding entanglement with raft.
Step 9: Signal hoist operator when ready for pickup.
warnings: Never grab helicopter cable before it grounds out on water - risk of electrical shock.
Ensure you can quickly release equipment to avoid being dragged underwater.
Keep one hand on raft until rescue device is secure - prevents separation if you lose grip.
